SQL.LOAD: SELECT dealer_id, effective_date, expiration_date, low_number_of_days, high_number_of_days, factor, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, delay_factor_id FROM elp_delay_factor WHERE delay_factor_id = :delay_factor_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT f.delay_factor_id, f.dealer_id, f.effective_date, f.expiration_date, f.low_number_of_days, f.high_number_of_days, f.factor, f.created_date, f.modified_date, f.created_by, f.modified_by FROM elp_delay_factor f WHERE f.dealer_id = :dealer_id AND f.effective_date = :effective_date AND f.expiration_date = :expiration_date ORDER BY f.low_number_of_days, f.high_number_of_days
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_DEALER: SELECT f.delay_factor_id, f.dealer_id, f.effective_date, f.expiration_date, f.low_number_of_days, f.high_number_of_days, f.factor, f.created_date, f.modified_date, f.created_by, f.modified_by FROM elp_delay_factor f WHERE f.dealer_id = :dealer_id ORDER BY f.low_number_of_days, f.high_number_of_days
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_delay_factor SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, low_number_of_days = :low_number_of_days, high_number_of_days = :high_number_of_days, factor = :factor, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE delay_factor_id = :delay_factor_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_delay_factor ( dealer_id, effective_date, expiration_date, low_number_of_days, high_number_of_days, factor, created_by, delay_factor_id ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :low_number_of_days, :high_number_of_days, :factor, :created_by, :delay_factor_id )
SQL.LOAD_DELAY_FACTOR_BY_DEALER: SELECT unique f.dealer_id, to_char(f.effective_date,'DD-Mon-YYYY') effective_date, to_char(f.expiration_date,'DD-Mon-YYYY') expiration_date, d.dealer dealer_code, d.dealer_name FROM elp_delay_factor f, elp_dealer d WHERE f.dealer_id = d.dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause --dynamic_order_by_clause
